short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work-life balance made easy with Todolis for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work-life balance made easy! Our Chrome extension brings the power of efficient task management right to your browser. Whether you're at work or planning your personal life, Todolis is here to keep everything in perfect harmony.
